definition: puffed/swollen/spongy/small lake (esp. in place names)/classifier for urine or feces

bubble/foam/blister (i.e. skin bubble)/to soak/to steep/to infuse/to dawdle/to shilly-shally/to hang about/to pick up (a girl)/to get off with (a sexual partner)/classifier for occurrences of an action/classifier for number of infusions
to emit bubbles/to bubble/to foam (with rage)/to seethe

sentences.english: And two long glasses brimmed with muscatel Bubble upon the table.
sentences.chinese: 桌上两个长脚玻璃盅注满了麝香葡萄酒，泛着泡沫。

sentences.english: High viscosity oils produce foam with small bubbles that do not break easily.
sentences.chinese: 高粘度油产生泡沫的小气泡，不容易突破。

sentences.english: Why was its bursting so painful?
sentences.chinese: 为什么泡沫破裂让我们如此痛苦不堪？

sentences.english: Some Super Automatic Espresso Machines will even froth and dispense milk automatically.
sentences.chinese: 还有一些自动咖啡机甚至会自动起泡沫并分配牛奶。

sentences.english: Check he expiry date for all foam extinguisher.
sentences.chinese: 检查所有泡沫灭火器的过期时间。

sentences.english: The foam concrete block was prepared by self-made compound protein foam agent.
sentences.chinese: 以自制复合型蛋白质为发泡剂，制备泡沫混凝土砌块。

sentences.english: How do you stay levelheaded in the middle of a bubble?
sentences.chinese: 在泡沫时期你怎么保持清醒的头脑？

sentences.english: However, these actions will not cure the post-bubble hangover of the over-extended consumer.
sentences.chinese: 不过，这些行动不会治愈过度消费的后泡沫残留影响。

sentences.english: The coco-cola frothed as it was poured out.
sentences.chinese: 可口可乐倒出来时泛起泡沫。

sentences.english: As the bubble deflates, China's exports are normalizing.
sentences.chinese: 当泡沫消去，中国的出口亦回归正常化。

sentences.english: Closed-cell foam withstands years of use and abuse.
sentences.chinese: 闭孔泡沫能够承受多年的使用和滥用。

sentences.english: NEW YORK (CNNMoney.com) -- It may be the world's last real estate bubble, one that is still inflating rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 这将是世界上依然在持续的泡沫，当然它还在膨胀。

sentences.english: It was not until 1991 that the property bubble burst.
sentences.chinese: 房地产泡沫直到1991年才告破。

sentences.english: Delusions, whether about tulips or Internet stocks, produce bubbles.
sentences.chinese: 无论是对郁金香还是网络股票的错觉都产生了泡沫。

sentences.english: Exfoliate or follow with a good foaming cleanser for a deeper clean.
sentences.chinese: 去角质，或者用泡沫丰富的洗面奶再做一次深沉洁面。

sentences.english: Aluminium foam special-shaped parts manufacture technology is a current important research field.
sentences.chinese: 泡沫铝异型件制备技术是当前研究的重要领域。

definition: to emit bubbles/to bubble/to foam (with rage)/to seethe
hot money, money flowing from one currency to another in the hope of quick profit
to bubble/to foam/to blister/to sprout boils (on one's body)/sparkling (wine etc)
credit crisis/see also 次貸危機|次贷危机[ci4 dai4 wei1 ji1]
subprime mortgage crisis/abbr. for 次級房屋信貸危機|次级房屋信贷危机[ci4 ji2 fang2 wu1 xin4 dai4 wei1 ji1]
